Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 about methods to analyze, explain, and interpret model output in the field of natural language processing (NLP). These articles cover various techniques and approaches to help understand and interpret the results of NLP models
Understanding and interpreting machine learning models for natural language processing" by SÃ¸gaard and Goldberg
- This article provides an overview of techniques for understanding and interpreting NLP models, including feature importance, attention mechanisms, and rule-based approaches
Explainable AI for NLP" by Lundqvist et al
- This paper discusses the challenges and opportunities of explainable NLP, including the use of visualization techniques, rule-based approaches, and model-agnostic methods

- This survey paper provides an overview of various techniques for explaining and interpreting NLP models, including rule-based approaches, attention mechanisms, and model-agnostic methods
